newsitem.title: USA: Siemens Medical Profile gets FDA approval.
newsitem.headline: Siemens Medical Profile gets FDA approval.

text.p: Siemens Medical Systems Inc's Nuclear Medicine Group said Friday it received approval from the U.S. Food and Drug Administration to market its Profile attenuation correction for its new dual-head, variable-angle E.CAM emission camera.
Siemens Medical is the U.S. affiliate of the medical engineering group of Siemens AG.
Profile addresses the problem of attenuation, or the reduction of detectable emissions, in clinical nuclear imaging, Siemens said.
Siemens said this correction is desirable to avoid possible misinterpretations of images.
